original_text: The five silly young women said to the other five young women, “Give us some of your oil, because our lamps are not giving much light.”
korean_text: 미련한 자들이 슬기 있는 자들에게 이르되 우리 등불이 꺼져가니 너희 기름을 좀 나눠 달라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: The five silly young women said
to the other five young women
Give us some of your oil

sentences.korean_translation: 많은 빛을 내지 않고 있기 때문입니다
